title: Mojito
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
10 and half fluid ounces white rum
author: Olivia French
steps: Muddle the lime juice, sugar and mint leaves in a small jug, crushing the mint as you go â€“ you can use the end of a rolling pin for this. Pour into a tall glass and add a handful of ice.
Pour over the rum, stirring with a long-handled spoon. Top up with soda water, garnish with mint and serve.
